name: 2 of a Kind
description:
2 of a Kind is a traditional matching game that challenges tradition. Simply find the matching symbols and make a pair. The nature of the pair you choose is completely unimportant as long as they work as a pair.

This game was made by 3 students as a creative project to analyse the nature of gender identity, sexual orientation and equality in modern media.

Drag and drop items into each box and hit "Match" to make a pair.
